Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>No time for small talk. I need to go join
Gesane in the food-gathering effort.<sp:0:4:0>If you really need to talk to me, find me
later and we can chat then.
Talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Shouldn't be much longer before the
food shortage is resolved. <sp:5:1:0>I think we're
going to make it just fine.
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Tired_01>So ends another busy day.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>My little sister, Bedoli, is swamped every
day with managing our supplies. We
barely ever get to see each other.<sp:0:4:0>Hopefully our jobs should calm down soon
now that the blizzard has stopped.
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>The blizzard stopping has been a big load
off my mind.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>That said, we're still short on supplies,
and I still spend a lot of time every day
gathering food.
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Looking for Tulin, huh? Fair enough.<sp:0:4:0>He's farther in this cave with Gesane.
They're scavenging for food.<sp:0:4:0>No, I'm not going to show you the way.
I need to keep an eye on what we've
amassed so far.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Be on your guard. There's a creature in
that cave that hops around on the walls.<sp:0:4:0>It probably won't bother you if you stay
away from it. Good luck finding Tulin.
Talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>No rest for the weary! But it's good not to
have to do it under the pressure that the
blizzard forced on us.<sp:0:4:0>Anyway. Time for another day's
honest work!
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Didn't think I'd be seeing anyone else in
these mountains anytime soon, what with
the blizzard and all.<sp:0:4:0>I'M here because it's a good place to find
food for my people. Why are YOU here?
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Thanks for tracking down that cave.<sp:0:4:0>Bedoli is over there organizing the
supplies, so I'll wait until she's free
to invite her to go check it out.<sp:0:4:0>The more bodies we bring, the more food
we can haul back to the village.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What? You found the cave?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Huh! <sp:5:1:0>So the "bird" I saw was some snow
that overlapped with the perch's shadow.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>What a relief! <sp:5:0:0>I feel so much better now
that I know what was going on there.<sp:0:4:0>Thanks! <sp:5:0:0>I'm going to find Bedoli so we
can check out the cave together!
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're looking for Tulin, he and Gesane
went deep into the cave to scavenge
for food.
It's a long way to where they are though,
and I can't exactly go with you.<sp:0:4:0>The moment I take my eyes off our stuff,
I just know some monster's going to come
along and snatch it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're going in to find Tulin, watch out
for the creature that hops around on the
walls in there.<sp:0:4:0>I don't think it'll hurt you if you stay away
from it, but you never know.
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I just lugged the food we scavenged from
the cave back to the village.<sp:0:4:0>It was a pretty good harvest, but not so
good that we can breathe easy.<sp:0:4:0>Once I'm rested, it's back to the food
hunt for me.
Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What possessed a Hylian to come out
here? Don't act like you don't feel the
weather. I can see you shivering inside.<sp:0:4:0>This isn't a good time to talk anyway.
I was about to join Gesane in the effort
to scavenge for food.<sp:0:4:0>The longer this blizzard goes, the harder
it gets just to keep ourselves fed.
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The food we scrounged is safe and sound
in the village now, but our work isn't over.<sp:0:4:0>Once I've had a rest, I'll be right back
at it.
